newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan urges tax registration before Sept 30.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan urges tax registration before Sept 30.

text.p: Pakistan's Central Board of Revenue (CBR) urged individuals and businesses on Wednesday to register with the income tax department before September 30 or face penalties.

"Strong punitive action will be taken against persons who are liable to be registered but do not get themselves registered by September 30," the official APP news agency quoted a CBR spokesman as saying.
He said the deadline, set at the request of the Federation of Pakistan Chambers of Commerce and Industry (FPCCI) and other trade associations, would not be extended.
